verses.text: Israel, return \w to|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* God; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H2719"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* sin.

\w Take|strong="H7725"\w* words \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. Tell \w him|strong="H7725"\w*, “Forgive \w all|strong="H5704"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w sins|strong="H5771"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* accept \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* good; \w so|strong="H7725"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* offer bulls \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* vowed \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* lips.

Assyria \w can|strong="H3947"\w*’t save \w us|strong="H7725"\w*. \w We|strong="H3605"\w* won’t ride \w on|strong="H3068"\w* horses; \w neither|strong="H5973"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w say|strong="H7725"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w more|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w work|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* hands, ‘\w Our|strong="H3068"\w* gods!’ \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* fatherless finds \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w*.”

“\w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* heal \w their|strong="H5921"\w* waywardness. \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w love|strong="H7355"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* freely; \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* anger \w is|strong="H3027"\w* turned \w away|strong="H5750"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H7725"\w* \w be|strong="H7725"\w* \w like|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* dew \w to|strong="H7725"\w* Israel. \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H7725"\w* blossom \w like|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* lily, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* send \w down|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* roots \w like|strong="H7725"\w* Lebanon.

\w His|strong="H5221"\w* branches \w will|strong="H1961"\w* spread, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w his|strong="H5221"\w* beauty \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* olive tree, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w his|strong="H5221"\w* fragrance \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w*.

Men \w will|strong="H1961"\w* dwell \w in|strong="H3212"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* shade. They \w will|strong="H1961"\w* revive \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* grain, \w and|strong="H3212"\w* blossom \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* vine. \w Their|strong="H1961"\w* \w fragrance|strong="H7381"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* wine \w of|strong="H7381"\w* \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w*.

Ephraim, what \w have|strong="H1612"\w* \w I|strong="H6738"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w do|strong="H1612"\w* any \w more|strong="H7725"\w* \w with|strong="H3427"\w* idols? \w I|strong="H6738"\w* \w answer|strong="H7725"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w will|strong="H3844"\w* \w take|strong="H7725"\w* care \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w him|strong="H7725"\w*. \w I|strong="H6738"\w* am \w like|strong="H7725"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* green cypress \w tree|strong="H1612"\w*; \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w me|strong="H7725"\w* \w your|strong="H7725"\w* fruit \w is|strong="H1715"\w* found.”

\w Who|strong="H4672"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* wise, \w that|strong="H4480"\w* \w he|strong="H4480"\w* \w may|strong="H4480"\w* understand these things? \w Who|strong="H4672"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* prudent, \w that|strong="H4480"\w* \w he|strong="H4480"\w* \w may|strong="H4480"\w* know \w them|strong="H4672"\w*? \w For|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* ways \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* right, \w and|strong="H6030"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* righteous walk \w in|strong="H4672"\w* \w them|strong="H4672"\w*, \w but|strong="H6030"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* rebellious stumble \w in|strong="H4672"\w* \w them|strong="H4672"\w*.
